title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 163.6 - Computation of instruction time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 163.6 - Computation of instruction time

State Regulations

To meet the minimum requirements, attendance shall be
computed on the basis of an hour equaling 50 minutes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
163.6

Adopted

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
